value.description: The numbers in the array represent the items selected by the picker-view-column in the picker-view (the subscript starts at 0), and the last item is selected when the number is larger than the length of the picker-view-column option.
value.description_zh: 数组中的数字依次表示 picker-view 内的 picker-view-column 选择的第几项（下标从 0 开始），数字大于 picker-view-column 可选项长度时，选择最后一项。

indicatorStyle.description: Sets the style of the checkbox in the middle of the selector
indicatorStyle.description_zh: 设置选择器中间选中框的样式

indicatorClass.description: Sets the class name of the checkbox in the middle of the selector
indicatorClass.description_zh: 设置选择器中间选中框的类名

maskStyle.description: Sets the style of the mask

maskClass.description: Set the class name of the mask

immediateChange.description: Whether the change event is triggered immediately when the finger is released. If not enabled, the change event will be triggered after the scrolling animation ends.
immediateChange.description_zh: 是否在手指松开时立即触发 change 事件。若不开启则会在滚动动画结束后触发 change 事件。

title.description: Selector title, it is recommended that the title be controlled within the length of 12 Chinese characters to avoid truncation, the truncated part will be ... Form of presentation
title.description_zh: 选择器标题，建议标题控制在 12 个中文汉字长度内，避免出现截断现象, 截断部分将以 ... 形式展示

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

onChange.description: When the scrolling selection is selected, the change event is triggered when the value changes, event.detail = {value: value};value is an array, indicating that the picker-view-column in the picker-view is currently selected for the first few items (the subscript starts from 0)
onChange.description_zh: 当滚动选择，value 改变时触发 change 事件，event.detail = {value: value}；value为数组，表示 picker-view 内的 picker-view-column 当前选择的是第几项（下标从 0 开始）

onPickStart.description: The event is triggered when the scroll selection starts
onPickStart.description_zh: 当滚动选择开始时候触发事件

onPickEnd.description: The event is triggered when the scroll selection ends
onPickEnd.description_zh: 当滚动选择结束时候触发事件
